title: when you feed your kallista and then she cleans up in a 3v2 with you as the jungle
body:
you just run in circles tanking as she stacks infinite rend stacks and then pops everyone for 700+ damage.
gg wp'ed
Why is this allowd to still exist though? LMFAO
its like if twitch had no cap on poison.
Just infinite stacking damage.
Fucking r%%%%%ed LOL

replies.body: if the kalista gets fed in lane thats your own fault shes easy to shut down and the easiest adc to kill if a single spell hits her
Implying Kalista would ever be able to pull that off against a competent team.
